message: I am waiting for this slowness at convore to be resolved
Been quiet round these parts of late, just wondered where everyone went to.
Also a lot of people just talk in private groups
My private groups are very active. I've noticed a lot of chats haven't been delivered lately. Refresh my browser and it works again for a while. I don't remember this happening until recently.
yeah it's very slow. also a good feature here would be to be able to mark one group read, not just every single post in every single group
